name: Student Programs and Fellowships
objective: Attract and recruit highly talented and qualified candidates who inclusively represent the cultural, social, ethnic, racial, gender, and geographic diversity of the United States and develop a cadre of future diplomats and professionals dedicated to representing America’s interests abroad.
applicant_types: Public nonprofit institution/organization (includes institutions of higher education and hospitals)

authorizations.text: State Dept Basic Authorities Act of 1956 , Title 22,, 2719, 47.
Pub. L. 117-328 (FY23 Consolidated Appropriations Act), Section 150 - 1990-1991 Department of State Authorization Bill, Public Law 101-246,.

rules_regulations: Varies. See NOFO on grants.gov for more info.
